file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  version: 1.0.0
  title: Partner chain writer server for light blockchain
  license:
    name: MIT
servers:
  - url: 'https://writer.networknt.com'
paths:
  '/txs':
    post:
      summary: Write a list of new transactions in a batch to the blockchain(s)
      operationId: createTransactions
      requestBody:
        description: Transactions in encoded format to add to the blockchain
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: array
              items:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Transaction' 
      tags:
        - txs
      security:
        - tx_auth:
            - 'tx.w'
      responses:
        '201':
          description: Null response
  '/tx':
    post:
      summary: Write a single transaction with a list of credit entries and debit entries to the blockchain(s)
      operationId: createTransaction
      requestBody:
        description: Transaction in encoded format to add to the blockchain
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Transaction' 
      tags:
        - tx
      security:
        - tx_auth:
            - 'tx.w'
      responses:
        '201':
          description: Null response
components:
  securitySchemes:
    tx_auth:
      type: oauth2
      description: This API uses OAuth 2.0 with the client credential grant flow.
      flows:
        clientCredentials:
          tokenUrl: 'https://localhost:6882/token'
          scopes:
            'tx.r': read tx
            'tx.w': write tx
  schemas:
    Transaction:
      type: object
      properties:
        currency: 
          type: string
          enum: [taiji]
        d:
          type: array
          items: 
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/LedgerEntry'
        c:
          type: array
          items: 
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/LedgerEntry'
    LedgerEntry:
      type: object
      properties:
        address: 
          type: string
        signedEntry:
          type: string

Error: notImplemented: path "/tx": post: security: security "tx_auth" (index 0): oauth2 security not implemented
